page.title: 01Gazetteer. Ilford Redbridge
page.content: Our block covers a mainly residential area in London Borough of Redbridge, falling within the localities of Chadwell Heath, Seven Kings, Ilford & Goodmayes. Ilford is the main{urban district and is undergoing extensive redevelopment at present. The only large factory in the block belongs to Plessey Ltd, manufacturing military{electronics.} The block is served by 8 primary and 5 secondary schools and Redbridge Technical College. There are 4 Parks and 2 Hospitals. Redbridge is a multi cultural borough with a large{Asian} population in the Ilford area. As a residential{suburb,}it enjoys ample transport facilities for the centre of London. Wayne Salmon & Vajinder Panesar, Loxford High School.
